content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal beliefs and opinions. However, it is common practice to inform departing employees of what to expect during exit interviews conducted electronically. This can include information on how the interview will be conducted, what questions will be asked, and how the information gathered will be used. It is important to provide this information to ensure that departing employees feel comfortable and prepared for the interview, and to ensure that the interview process is transparent and fair.
